remarks: Property of a complex Hilbert-space-valued state.  Definition of CH-states in [Mayet3] p. 9.  (Contributed by NM, 25-Jun-2006.) (New usage is discouraged.)
statement:
ishst $p |- ( S e. CHStates <-> ( S : CH --> ~H /\ ( normh ` ( S ` ~H ) ) = 1 /\ A. x e. CH A. y e. CH ( x C_ ( _|_ ` y ) -> ( ( ( S ` x ) .ih ( S ` y ) ) = 0 /\ ( S ` ( x vH y ) ) = ( ( S ` x ) +h ( S ` y ) ) ) ) ) ) $.
$d S x y $.
$d x y $.
$d x y $.
